Retro Games Hello world! Settings
//Pacman Resume New Game How To Play HOW TO PLAY Pacman, our hero, munches his way around the map, eating all of thedots. However, life isn't easy for our young little hero. Along his journey, he facesspooky ghosts who will try to hurt him. Avoid them! In each corner of the map, there is apower pellet. If Pacman eats a power pellet, he is temporarily gains the power to eat enemyghosts. CONTROLS Up: Swipe Up
Down: Swipe Down
Left: Swipe Left
Right: Swipe Right
"Pause: Hold Screen " Settings Resume
